Key Match Events: DL Hall delivered seven scoreless innings in the second game of the doubleheader.
William Contreras and Willy Adames both hit home runs in both games of the doubleheader.
Willy Adames hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning of Game 2, contributing to a 10-run inning for the Brewers.
Post-Match Reflections: Willy Adames commented on the team's mindset of focusing on winning the moment.
Manager Pat Murphy praised DL Hall's performance and its potential impact on the team's future plans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers swept the doubleheader against the Reds.
The Brewers achieved a double-digit lead on every other team in the National League Central.
The Brewers tied with the Phillies for the second-best record in the National League.
